modName: WinterGreen ENB compatible with Vivid Weathers and Climates of Tamriel
summary: A minty fresh ENB preset.  Updated 8/13/18 updated vanilla weathers edition for 319 ENB binary
descriptionHtml:
[center]WinterGreen ENB by mobiusbelmont


[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/e8ebb9fbca8d51bbdececa32a7eaee9f/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso2_540.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/a7fdca265576e4b0981da44914f9f9e0/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso3_540.jpg[/img]
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/d99a0a5132bd9d72e6d8793df15e1015/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso6_540.jpg[/img][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/a5fa6520325d523a3a38db80f9e497ad/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso9_540.jpg[/img][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/bedce21b0414b334a3e4724b30ac9215/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso4_540.jpg[/img][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/31f00aeeb7a1acb92c3d93a9d3faf030/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso5_540.jpg[/img][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/846da4e953a925497dfcf6cbd5b45c5d/tumblr_pddt8bVZXd1s2ptqso7_540.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]




WinterGreen ENB now has separate versions for vanilla weathers, NLA plugin, Climates of Tamriel, and Vivid Weathers. 
An interior lighting mod such as Relighting Skyrim, ELE lite, or ELFX interiors are highly recommended but not required.




Installation
1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (wrapper version from the latest version)

2.Copy and paste the WinterGreen ENB files to your Skyrim folder.  if using CoT or NLA plugin, then copy download and use the appropriate files.  if you are using vanilla weathers or another weather mod not listed, also use the vanilla preset.

3. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0


Other notes:

- Please use the proper binary for each edition.  CoT and NLA versions wrequire binary 315, and will not work with 319 

-   You can enable/disable Depth of Field  it by opening the enbseries.ini file, find DepthofField under [Effect] and change it to false.  Additionally, you can press shift-enter while playing to bring up the ENB GUI and disable it there (again, it's under effect)


For more information on how to configure Skyrim for ENB, consult these:

1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?]Skyrim optimization and stability guide[/url]

2) the [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB]S.T.E.P. Guide for ENB



[/url]CREDITS:
[url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series Developer
[/url]Kyokushinoyama- lens and bloom effect files ([url=http://www.deadendthrills.com/forum/discussion/75/enb-preset-kyo-s-tesv-skyrim-enbs]http://www.deadendthrills.com/forum/discussion/75/enb-preset-kyo-s-tesv-skyrim-enbs[/url])
Kojak /Rampage ENB- DoF
author: mobiusbelmont
